metadata.title: CVE-2024-23284 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in tvOS 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, Safari 17.4. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may prevent Content Security Policy frombeing enforced.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
